replies.body:
You wouldn't have been instant perma'd, the system can't do that for chat, but you certainly would have skipped the chat restrictions into a 14-day :P

It's always nice to hear reform stories, especially since forums tend to attract the more...negatively inclined posts of this nature.

Hi Seras,

This isn't quite relevant my friend's toxicity. Thanks for helping my friend when he got his account banned for 'hacking'. Everyone literally thought he was going to lose his account to some dickhead somehow getting a hold of it. (As you could tell from the post, we all thought that if he was to ever lose his account - it'd be to toxicity rather than stupid hacking). c:
Yeah I still really appreciate you helping me get my account back Seras!!!  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
